title: GitHub Profile Explorer
description: GitHub Profile Explorer is a client-side web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that enables users to query GitHub's public API to retrieve and display user profile information and repository data. The application leverages the GitHub REST API to fetch real-time data without requiring backend infrastructure.
features: Search functionality for querying GitHub users by username
Renders users avatar, follower/following counts, and repository statistics
Displays repositories with metadata including programming language, star count, and descriptions
Implements next/previous navigation for efficient repository browsing
Gracefully manages missing or unavailable profile data (email, company, etc.)

title: Currency Converter
description: A simple and responsive currency converter web application built with React.js and Tailwind CSS. Convert between different currencies with real-time exchange rates fetched from a public API.
features: Real-time Exchange Rates - Fetches live currency data from a free API
Multiple Currency Pairs - Convert between any available currency pairs
Default USD to BDT - Pre-configured with USD to BDT conversion
Responsive UI - Works seamlessly on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices
Easy-to-Use Interface - Simple design for quick conversions

title: Todo List App
description: A simple and intuitive Todo List application built with React.js and Tailwind CSS for efficient task management.
features: Add, edit, and delete tasks
Mark tasks as completed
Filter tasks by status (all, active, completed)
Quickly find tasks using the search bar
Responsive design for mobile and desktop

title: Wern Finance
description: A modern, scroll-based animated landing page for a cryptocurrency payment platform built with React and cutting-edge animation libraries (Frontend - Only).
features: Responsive design ensuring optimal viewing across devices
Smooth scroll-based animations enhancing user engagement
Interactive elements providing dynamic user experience
Integration of modern animation libraries for fluid transitions

title: Product Filtering Page
description: A product filtering and detail page built with React.js to demonstrate context API usage, data fetching, and routing concepts. This project showcases a functional product filtering system that allows users to browse products by category and view detailed information about individual items. Built as a learning exercise to reinforce React fundamentals including Context API, hooks, and React Router.
features: Product Listing - Displays a list of products with images, names, prices, and categories.
Category Filtering - Allows users to filter products by selecting categories from a sidebar.
Product Details - Clicking on a product navigates to a detailed view with more information.
Context API - Utilizes React's Context API for state management across components.
